creator: nandkumar.kesavan@sun.com
text:
It appears that part of the documentation for the Resource Resolver is in
German. Since I am quite at sea with understanding German (I really should pick
it up sometime :)  ), I am not sure if I missed anything important there. Can
this be translated?

creator: raul-info@r-bg.com
text: Seems fixed for a long time.
